# Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(viridis)
```

# Data
## Tx area
```{r}
cc = read.csv("../data/VegGrid/ccVegAreaGrid.csv")
sc = read.csv("../data/VegGrid/scVegAreaGrid.csv")
```

```{r}
cc30 = read.csv("../data/VegGrid/ccVegAreaGrid30.csv")
sc30 = read.csv("../data/VegGrid/scVegAreaGrid30.csv")
```

```{r}
ccPx = read.csv("../data/VegGrid/ccGridPxArea.csv")
```

```{r}
head(cc)
head(ccPx)
head(sc)
head(sc30)
```
# Area total

```{r}
cc %>% summarise(totalSqm = sum(vegSum),
                 totalSqkm = (totalSqm/1e6),
                 toalAcres = (totalSqkm*247.1))
```

```{r}
ccPx %>% summarise(totalSqm = sum(sum),
                 totalSqkm = (totalSqm/1e6),
                 toalAcres = (totalSqkm*247.1))
```
```{r}
sc %>% summarise(totalSqm = sum(vegSum),
                 totalSqkm = (totalSqm/1000000),
                 toalAcres = (totalSqkm*247.1))
```
